Page.Title: Hello, World!
Page.Description: This is an template for a new NextJS project with i18n support.

LoginView.Title: You're not logged in
LoginView.Description: To access groups and views posts you need an active account.

ChooseUsername.Title: Choose a username
ChooseUsername.Description: Staying anonymous isn't fun nor an option. Choose a username to stand out!
ChooseUsername.Label: Username

Errors.Missing: No username was provided in the HTTP request.
Errors.TooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
Errors.InvalidCharacters: Username can only contain letters, numbers and hyphens.
Errors.InvalidEnding: Username cannot end with a special character.
Errors.InvalidStarting: Username cannot start with a special character.
Errors.Unknown: This username is invalid for an unknown reason.

Reasons.HARMFUL_CONTENT: This account has been locked {time} for posting harmful content.
Reasons.HARASSMENT: This account has been locked {time} for harassment.
Reasons.HATE_SPEECH: This account has been locked {time} for hate speech.
Reasons.IMPERSONATION: This account has been locked {time} for impersonation.
Reasons.SPAM: This account has been locked {time} for spam.
Reasons.INAPPROPRIATE_CONTENT: This account has been locked {time} for posting inappropriate content.
Reasons.MULTIPLE_VIOLATIONS: This account has been locked {time} for breaking multiple community rules.
Reasons.SECURITY_CONCERNS: This account has been locked {time} for security reasons.
Reasons.BANNED_IP: This account has been locked {time} for using a banned IP address.
Reasons.HARMFUL_AUTOMATION: This account has been locked {time} for using harmful automation.
Reasons.FAKE_ENGAGEMENT: This account has been locked {time} for using fake engagement.
Reasons.ILLEGAL_CONTENT: This account has been locked {time} for posting illegal content.
Reasons.UNDERAGE: This account has been locked {time} for being created by a minor.
Reasons.TRADEMARK_VIOLATION: This account has been locked {time} for violating trademark rights.
Reasons.COPYRIGHT_VIOLATION: This account has been locked {time} for violating copyright rights.
Reasons.PLATFORM_MANIPULATION: This account has been locked {time} for manipulating the platform.
Reasons.INVESTIGATION_PENDING: This account has been locked {time} pending investigation.
